content.title: AfterHours PvE
content.text: Quick Start • Be kind. No griefing/stealing. • Build respectfully; don’t block key spawns/paths. • Join Discord for support & announcements. Open the UI • Keyboard/Mouse: press F2 for WShop. • Controller: Left Thumbstick + Left Shoulder to open UI; F2 on K/M. Need help? Join Discord: discord.gg/QCSnTXExdq

content.title: Conduct
content.text:
• Be respectful.
• No harassment/toxicity.
• English only in global chat.

content.title: Building
content.text:
• No blocking artifacts/obelisks/mission areas.
• Keep bases tidy; reduce spam pillars/foundations.

content.title: Gameplay
content.text:
• PvE only; no griefing.
• Lure griefing and tame stealing are not allowed.

content.title: Support
content.text:
• Use Discord tickets.
• Report issues with coords/screenshots.

content.title: Core
content.text:
• Boosted PvE x10.
• XP / Harvest tuned for balance.

content.title: Taming & Breeding
content.text:
• Faster taming.
• Breeding/maturation accelerated.
• Imprint intervals adjusted.

content.title: Notes
content.text:
• Full details in Discord.
• Rates may change for balance.

content.title: Open WShop
content.text:
• Keyboard/Mouse: Press F2 to open the WShop menu.
• Controller: Left Thumbstick + Left Shoulder to open UI.
• Tip: Avoid combat while browsing.

content.title: Status & Events
content.text:
• Players online: (to be wired)
• Server uptime: (to be wired)
• Next event: (to be wired)

Join Discord for alerts: discord.gg/QCSnTXExdq

content.title: Community & Support
content.text:
